mapper.select: SELECT coupon_name AS couponName, coupon_discount AS couponDiscount, coupon_regdate AS couponRegDate, coupon_enddate AS couponEndDate, coupon_remain AS couponRemain, coupon_term_price AS couponTermPrice, coupon_code AS couponCode FROM cia_coupons
SELECT menu_Image AS menuImage FROM cia_menu WHERE menu_name = 'red'
SELECT menu_name AS menuName, menu_price AS menuPrice, menu_info AS menuInfo, menu_open AS menuOpen, shop_name AS shopName, menu_num AS menuNum, menu_Image AS menuImage FROM cia_menu

SELECT o.order_num, o.order_date, m.*, n.menu_name, d.user_addr1, d.order_price FROM cia_order o LEFT OUTER JOIN cia_order_detail d ON o.order_num = d.order_num
LEFT OUTER JOIN cia_delivery l ON d.order_num = l.order_num
LEFT OUTER JOIN cia_order_menu m ON l.order_num = m.order_num
LEFT OUTER JOIN cia_menu n ON m.menu_num = n.menu_num
WHERE l.order_state = 'new' AND o.shop_name = #{shopName}

SELECT o.order_num, o.order_date, m.*, n.menu_name, d.user_addr1, d.order_price FROM cia_order o LEFT OUTER JOIN cia_order_detail d ON o.order_num = d.order_num
LEFT OUTER JOIN cia_delivery l ON d.order_num = l.order_num
LEFT OUTER JOIN cia_order_menu m ON l.order_num = m.order_num
LEFT OUTER JOIN cia_menu n ON m.menu_num = n.menu_num
WHERE l.order_state = 'commit' AND o.shop_name = #{shopName}

SELECT o.order_num, o.order_date, m.*, n.menu_name, d.user_addr1, d.order_price FROM cia_order o LEFT OUTER JOIN cia_order_detail d ON o.order_num = d.order_num
LEFT OUTER JOIN cia_delivery l ON d.order_num = l.order_num
LEFT OUTER JOIN cia_order_menu m ON l.order_num = m.order_num
LEFT OUTER JOIN cia_menu n ON m.menu_num = n.menu_num
WHERE l.order_state = 'cook' AND o.shop_name = #{shopName}

SELECT o.order_num, p.original_price, p.coupon_discount, d.delivery_price, p.order_price FROM cia_order o LEFT OUTER JOIN cia_payment p ON o.order_num = p.order_num LEFT OUTER JOIN cia_delivery d ON p.order_num = d.order_num WHERE d.order_state = 'end' AND o.shop_name = #{shopName} AND TO_CHAR(o.order_date) BETWEEN #{dayStart} AND #{dayEnds}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO cia_review_reply (reply_num, review_num, shop_name, reply_content) VALUES(REPLY_SEQ.nextval, #{writeReviewNum}, #{writeShopName}, #{writeReplyContent})
